title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Discover the timeless tradition of excellence with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils! These pre-sharpened, golden yellow beauties come in a convenient 30-count package, perfect for students, artists, and professionals alike. Crafted with over 100 years of experience, these pencils boast an exclusive #2 graphite formula for unmatched smoothness and consistency.

The thick graphite core ensures uniform lines, while the premium, responsibly sourced wood offers a comfortable grip for all your writing and drawing needs. The pencils are finished with a golden yellow lacquer and a matte coating, giving them a polished yet functional look.

But what truly sets these pencils apart is their legendary eraser. Latex-free and smudge-free, this high-performing eraser removes marks completely without leaving any unwanted residue. And don't forget the signature green and gold ferrule that adds a touch of class to these iconic writing instruments.

As part of the Dixon Ticonderoga family, these pencils are PMA certified non-toxic and highly preferred by teachers. So why wait? Experience the unmatched quality and craftsmanship of Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils today!
